alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Grayson; Hancock (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 27 at 11:28PM EDT until September 28 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hancock County in central Kentucky... North central Grayson County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Breckinridge County in central Kentucky... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1028 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southwest of Hardinsburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Concord, Mcquady, Se Ree, Westview, Duff, Tar Fork, Cabot, Vanzant, Fisher and Dempster. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
